step_feedback.feedback: Great job finding a comfortable position and placing your hands on your abdomen. Remember to inhale slowly through your nose while tightening your whole body muscles.
You're doing well with the hand placement. Focus on exhaling slowly through your mouth while relaxing your muscles. Visualize pushing fluid out as you exhale.
Excellent! Keep up the slow nasal inhale and whole-body muscle tightening. Visualize the fluid moving towards your chest as you breathe in.
Fantastic! Continue exhaling through your mouth and relaxing your muscles. This visualization of pushing fluid out is key to lymphatic drainage.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with this deep breathing exercise! Remember to inhale through your nose, tightening your body, and exhale through your mouth, relaxing. This helps move fluid and promotes healing.
